sex.Description: Sex of the participant based on self-report

bmi.Description: Body Mass Index (BMI) based on self-reported height and weight

participant_id.Description: Recording ID, named due to BIDS conventions. See 'pid' for unique participant identifier

age.Description: Age at the time of the recording based on self-report

pid.Description: Unique participant identifier; is the same for all sessions of the same individual
